title: Rip Van Winkle
creator_credit: Billy Budd Films and Will Vinton
brief_description: A clay-animated adaptation of Washington Irving’s classic tale about a free spirit who preferred telling stories to ploughing the land. Although the townsfolk enjoyed his antics they scorned his lack of such Puritan virtues as thrift and hard work. Suitable for 7-11 years.
